Uses of Class
org.odftoolkit.odfdom.incubator.search.Selection

  • Packages that use Selection 
    Package Description
    org.odftoolkit.odfdom.incubator.search
    Provide classes to operate the content and style of the selected text content.

    • Uses of Selection in org.odftoolkit.odfdom.incubator.search

      Subclasses of Selection in org.odftoolkit.odfdom.incubator.search 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  TextSelection
      A TextSelection can describe a sub element in a mParagraph element or a mHeading element.
